tag_list: carrabino, microsoft, product-management, startups, web, digital-marketing, apollo, vistadb
overview:
I’m a digital marketing professional. I specialize in applying neuromarketing techniques and my own proven marketing know-how to generate excitement and interest in the products that I manage.

My Background

I was a Sr. Product Manager at Microsoft, where I received several Microsoft marketing awards as the Digital Marketing Lead for SQL Server and BizTalk. I was personally responsible for influencing millions of web visitors annually and affecting over $4B of Microsoft revenue. This amazing experience allowed me to directly manage Microsoft’s worldwide marketing muscles.

Before joining Microsoft, I owned Vista Software where I managed the software development and marketing efforts for two award-winning database products. During this time, I also served as VP of Marketing for CyberSage, where my efforts directly helped us get acquired by Macromedia (now Adobe).

These diverse experiences have exposed me to a wide range of difficult and exciting marketing challenges. From managing all marketing efforts on a shoe string budget, to driving global marketing efforts across dozens of products and cross-functional teams worldwide with multimillion dollar budgets at Microsoft. Specialties

advertising, branding, creative, digital marketing, graphics design, information architecture, interaction design, marketing, mobile web, neuro web design, neuromarketing, new product development, product management, software design and development, start-ups, user experience design, video editing, web design, web development
